SongName: Love You Like A Love Song
Lyric:
[by:HYUNO]
[00:17.03]It's been said and done
[00:19.29]Every beautiful thought's been already sung
[00:23.57]And I guess right now here's another one
[00:28.12]So your melody will play on and on with best we own
[00:34.69]You are beautiful like a dream come alive incredible
[00:41.17]A center full of miracle lyrical
[00:45.89]You've saved my life again
[00:49.93]And I want you to know baby
[00:53.34]I I love you like a love song baby
[00:57.76]I I love you like a love song baby
[01:02.09]I I love you like a love song baby
[01:06.53]And I keep it in re-pe-pe-peat
[01:10.91]I I love you like a love song baby
[01:15.40]I I love you like a love song baby
[01:19.75]I I love you like a love song baby
[01:24.19]And I keep it in re-pe-pe-peat
[01:27.99]Cursing me girl you played through my mind like a symphony
[01:34.08]There's no way to describe what you do to me
[01:38.49]You just do to me what you do
[01:43.12]And it feels like I've been rescued
[01:47.56]I've been set free
[01:49.45]I am hyptonized by your destiny
[01:53.88]You are magical lyrical beautiful
[01:58.28]You are and I want you to know baby
[02:03.82]I I love you like a love song baby
[02:08.28]I I love you like a love song baby
[02:12.61]I I love you like a love song baby
[02:16.98]And I keep it in re-pe-pe-peat
[02:21.34]I I love you like a love song baby
[02:25.71]I I love you like a love song baby
[02:30.25]I I love you like a love song baby
[02:34.57]And I keep it in re-pe-pe-peat
[02:39.05]No one can pause
[02:41.66]You stand alone to every record I own
[02:48.14]Music to my hear that's what you are
[02:53.55]A song that goes on and on
[02:56.64]I I love you like a love song baby
[03:00.99]I I love you like a love song baby
[03:05.46]I I love you like a love song baby
[03:09.74]And I keep it in re-pe-pe-peat
[03:14.25]I I love you like a love song baby
[03:18.62]I I love you like a love song baby
[03:22.97]I I love you like a love song baby
[03:27.49]And I keep it in re-pe-pe-peat
